card_pen_effect: Once per turn: You can target 1 DARK Spellcaster-Type monster you control; apply this effect to it, then destroy this card. Once applied, double any battle damage that monster inflicts to your opponent this turn if it battles an opponent's monster.
card_text: (This card is always treated as a "Pendulum Dragon" card.)$NIf this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Pendulumgraph" card from your Deck to your hand.
